definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of dextran 40 on the analysis of acyclovir for injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究右旋糖酐40對注射用阿昔洛韋檢驗的影響。

sentences.english: CONCLUSIONS:There is incompatibility between gatifloxacin for injection and aciclovir for injection.
sentences.chinese: 結論注射用加替沙星與注射用阿昔洛韋存在配伍禁忌。
